topic.title: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1977–1980, Volume XXVII, Western Europe: Canada, Federal Republic of Germany, and Nordic Countries Chapters
topic.body: These chapters document the Carter administration’s approach to relations with Canada, West Germany, and the Nordic countries (Denmark, Finland, Iceland, Norway, and Sweden). The remaining chapters in the volume will be released as they are cleared for publication.
topic.image-description: Book Cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1977–1980, Volume XXVII, Western Europe
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
